name: Burial Mound of Myr
description:
This is the burial mound of Myr, a Voskur heroine who ruled over northern men and giant folk alike. Myr was a warrior queen and fought the titanic hordes of Horbog the Destroyer. She is often mistaken for Helga, another courageous sovereign who stood against the Sons of Skandir.

Este é o monte sepulcral de Myr, uma heroína Voskur que reinou sobre os homens do norte e o povo gigante igualmente. Myr era uma rainha guerreira e lutou contra as hordas titânicas de Horbog, o Destruidor. Ela é freqüentemente confundida com Helga, outra soberana corajosa que se levantou contra os Filhos de Skandir.

Age of Gods — https://horoscopezine.itch.io/age-of-gods

MSX — https://horoscopezine.itch.io/msx-english

Rush — https://horoscopezine.itch.io/rush
